member.name: VisualMutationType
member.summary: Defines constants that specify whether the element was added to or removed from the live visual tree.

member.name: VisualMutationType.Add
member.summary: The child element was added to the visual tree of the parent element.

member.name: VisualMutationType.Remove
member.summary: The child element was removed from the visual tree of the parent element.
